content: create a customer solution to the customer pain point - Cost and availablity: Sustainable fashion products are often more expensive than conventional products, which can be a barrier for some customers. Limited Availability: Many customers struggle to find sustainable fashion products that meet their needs, as they may not be widely available in their area. Similar to sustainable fashion, some customers may struggle to find culturally-inspired fashion products that meet their needs, as they may not be widely available in their area. - focusing on diverse distribution channels, products at different price points and being willing to invest in high quality premium products made by global artisans paid fairly that will last a long time
